comment._content: Are there any texts connected with these photographs?  I'm interested in the Franklin family.

comment.author: 32605636@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/42400804@N05] There is an article in the Brisbane Courier that mentions the preparation for this parade nla.gov.au/nla.news-article20247271 where " a record gathering is assured" but no additional information with the photograph or information about the Franklin family.
